txt.en: 'Now that the Ford is safe, the post can be delivered without fear. Let us return.'
The post is late from the Shire and the news is that something has the post-carrier spooked and unwilling to make the crossing. You have been sent to investigate.
Escort the post-worker across the Ford
'Merry me, it sure is good to deliver the post again. You have my thanks!'
Escort the post-worker across the Ford
Guide the Post-person across the Ford
